<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter from Lucifer to his Roman agents N.T., W.P., J.F., & R.L., Sir Edmond-bury Godfrey's back-friends
4 p.
Printed for Charles Lee, London : 1682.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. "A present from an unknown friend, to Sir Edmond-bury Godfrey's brothers" -- p. 3-4 in verse. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

4 p.
Printed for Charles Lee, London : 1682.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. "A present from an unknown friend, to Sir Edmond-bury Godfrey's brothers" -- p. 3-4 in verse. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
Charles Lee
